title: Backend Development
text: Building robust APIs and scalable web services using C#/.NET, leveraging CQRS, Clean Architecture, and SQL Server — with hands-on experience across HR systems, insurance platforms, healthcare, and e-commerce domains.

title: Frontend Development
text: Crafting dynamic, responsive web applications with Angular and TypeScript, from employee portals with complex form workflows to interactive dashboards — also experienced with React and Next.js for modern web projects.

title: API Integration
text: Connecting systems through third-party API integrations including Hubstaff, Zoom, Paynamics, SharePoint, and more — with a focus on optimizing rate limits, batching strategies, and data consistency.

title: Process Automation
text: Streamlining repetitive tasks and workflows through Python scripts, PowerShell automation, batch (.bat) files, Azure WebJobs, Functions, and CI/CD pipelines to cut manual effort and boost efficiency.
